title: Cannot open Firefox
content:
I cannot open Firefox. Error message appears: "Firefox is already running, but is not responding. The old Firefox process must be closed to open a new window."

Task Manager always shows three active Firefox Apps, but ending those tasks does not help. I don't see any other active Mozilla procces on the list

I have uninstalled and reinstalled Firefox from MS Store but that does not help either.
creator: bsimonov

title: Web WhatsApp failed to load after upgrading to v110.0
content: After upgrading firefox to 110.0, WhatsApp web failed to load. I refreshed the browser also as I found one solution on forums, but after QR code came but failed to load the chat.
creator: kool_07garg

title: Problems switching over from Google Chrome to Firefox
content:
I'm still running Windows 7 and I won't give it up. Google Chrome notified me that their browser will no longer update with new versions of Google Chrome, so I switched to Firefox which is not a chromium-based browser.

I successfully imported all my files and bookmarks, etc., so that's okay.

The problem is that all of my desktop icons and bookmarks are all tainted with Google Chrome. What I mean by that is that if I click on any desktop icon or bookmark, my computer wants to open that website using Google Chrome and not Firefox.

While I can reset these to open with Firefox one icon or bookmark at a time, this would be very time-consuming since I have several dozen bookmarks and appx. 35 desktop icons.

Is there a way I can take care of all of these at one time?

Thank you,

George in Arizona
creator: argonne1

title: How do I always show open tabs
content:
I recently updated to Firefox 110.0. The tabs display at the top of the window in Firefox Mac as they always have.

The problem is that they auto-hide in Firefox Windows and I have to press the Alt key to re-display them. I want the always visible. How do I turn the auto-hide feature off?

I checked for browser extensions on the Windows version and don't have any installed. The only plugins are codec- or encryption-related.

I'm not sure whether this new behavior is new to 110 or to a less recent version as I use the Windows version less often than the Mac version.
creator: CharlesBelov

title: I'm not able to retrieve recently closed windows or tabs from history.
content:
Since the last Firefox update I'm not able to retrieve "Recently Closed Windows or Tabs" from history. Is this a coincidence or is there a systems issue? Is there something I can do to fix it? If I can't fix it what s/b my next action?

Thanks in advance for your knowledge sharing,

Paul
creator: 2ofUsBoth

title: How to show Pocket Discover in Firefox New Tab?
content:
Hi,

Previously, I saw Pocket Discover recommendation tiles when opening a New Tab in Firefox. However, I haven't seen that lately every time I open a New Tab. I believe I set everything with Firefox default settings. Please advise.

Thank you.
creator: dira.mochtar

title: new version of firefox wass instaalled & all my bookmarks a gone!!
content: bold textall bookmarks are lost after new version was installed
creator: jg61152

title: Upgrade to Firefox version 11 stuck
content:
Hello,

I was prompted that an upgrade was available and attempted to download/upgrade it.

Firefox upgrade to version 11. From version Firefox 109.0.1 on MACOS 12.6.3 After downloading I start Firefox get pop to install a new helper tool. I enter my admin name & password to allow this.

If I enter the correct user/password & click Install Helper the pop up disappears and nothing happens. When I launch FF again it prompts again same message. IF I enter the wrong passed it shakes and asks again.

Seems stuck anyone else having this problem and a possible workaround?

Thanks
creator: fran33336

title: Missing Browsing History
content: For a couple of week, my firefox browsing history always clean itself up either when I close and shutdown my computer or while I still browsing. This is really frustrated because I have to always search again and again. I have deleted every firefox sync account of my phone and tablet and the only account that still I use is in my pc. Can anybody help me?
creator: adhitya.lamperouge
